title: Toyota sales grow 32% to 20,494 units in April
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor reported a 32% YoY increase in wholesales to 20,494 units in April, despite a week-long maintenance shutdown. The company's domestic sales reached 18,700 units, while exports reached 1,794 units. The company's diversified portfolio reflects its strong market connection.
